participant_1.background:
I live a life of fun and adventures with my friends and love capturing the moments with my iPhone
my weekends are filled with bird watching.
I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I work a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.

participant_2.background:
I'm a proud dog dad to my two puppies.
i live in nashville.
i always travel alone.
My job is to explore the world and share my adventures with others.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It is going well! I just finished taking a hike with my dogs.
That sounds fun! I love taking hikes. Where do you usually go hiking?
I usually hike in the mountains around Nashville. I love the views from up there.
I've never been to Nashville before. I'm from California.
You should definitely come visit! There's a lot to see and do here.
What are some of your favorite things to do in Nashville?
I love going to concerts and festivals. There's always something going on here.
What's the last concert you went to?
I went to a concert by my favorite band, The Black Keys, a few weeks ago. It was amazing!
I love The Black Keys! I saw them in concert a few years ago. They put on a great show.
They do! I'm so glad I got to see them live.
Me too! It sounds like we have a lot in common. We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to explore the mountains with you.
Great! We can plan a hike for next weekend.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it
